summary: Adds active magic effect bonuses when wielding Skyrim, Dawnguard & Dragonborn staff-type weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-3-1365283267.png[/img]

This mod adds a script to all the [size=3][b]Skyrim[/b][/size], [size=3][b]Dawnguard[/b][/size], & [size=3][b]Dragonborn[/b][/size] staffs
that adds different bonus active effects (depending on the staff type) to anyone
that equips them. The buff is not exclusive to only the player.


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33564-1-1363692525.png[/img]
[/center]


[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-5-1365283267.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Skyrim[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]Dawnguard[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]Dragonborn[/b][/size]
[size=3][b][/b][/size]

[/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-4-1365283267.png[/img]
[u][b][size=4]Different BONUSES: Version 1.10a[/size][/b][/u]

[color=#ffffff][b]Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 10% of all incoming Magic damage. Regenerate Magicka 25% faster.[/color]

[color=#008000][b]Alteration Staffbuff[/b] - Alteration spells cost 10% less Magicka and lasts 25% longer.[/color]

[color=#993366][b]Conjuration Staffbuff[/b] - Conjuration spells cost 10% less Magicka and lasts 25% longer.[/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]Destruction Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells cost 10% less Magicka and are 25% stronger.[/color]

[color=#33cccc][b]Illusion Staffbuff[/b] - Illusion spells cost 10% less Magicka and are 25% stronger.[/color]

[color=#0000ff][b]Restoration Staffbuff[/b] - Restoration spells cost 10% less Magicka and are 25% stronger.[/color]


[color=#c0c0c0][b]Aetherial Staffbuff[/b] - 25% Spell Absorption. Resist 40% of all shock damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Corruption Staffbuff[/b] - Illusion spells are 50% stronger and Magicka pool is increased by 50 at the cost of 25 reduced health.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Dragonpriest Staffbuff[/b] - Grants 15% Magic resistance and 50% increased Magicka regeneration. Magicka pool increased by 25.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Dwemer Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 25% of all shock damage. Magicka Regenerates 25% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Falmer Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 20% of all Frost Magic. Regenerate Magicka 30% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Forsworn Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction and Restoration spells are 25% stronger.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Hag\'s Wrath Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 25% stronger and costs 25% less Magicka. Resist 25% of all incoming Fire damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Jyrik\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka regenerates 100% faster. Destruction spells are 20% stronger. 25% spell absorption.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Magnus Staffbuff[/b] - All spells are 10% longer and stronger. All spells costs 10% less Magicka. Magic resistance is increased by 20%. Magicka regeneration rate and pool are increased by 50.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Melka\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 30% stronger. Increases Magicka pool by 25.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Miraak\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 30% stronger. Magicka and Stamina increased by 60. Resist 30% of all [b]incoming Poison[/b] damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Sanguine Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka, Health, and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Wabbajack Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka regenerates 500% faster. Reduces magicka pool by 100.[/color]



[u][b][size=4]Different BONUSES: Version 1.10b[/size][/b][/u]
[color=#ffffff][b]Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 20% of all incoming Magic damage. Regenerate Magicka 50% faster.[/color]

[color=#008000][b]Alteration Staffbuff[/b] - Alteration spells cost 20% less Magicka and lasts 50% longer.[/color]

[color=#993366][b]Conjuration Staffbuff[/b] - Conjuration spells cost 20% less Magicka and lasts 50% longer.[/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]Destruction Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells cost 20% less Magicka and are 50% stronger.[/color]

[color=#33cccc][b]Illusion Staffbuff[/b] - Illusion spells cost 20% less Magicka and are 50% stronger.[/color]

[color=#0000ff][b]Restoration Staffbuff[/b] - Restoration spells cost 20% less Magicka and are 50% stronger.[/color]


[color=#c0c0c0][b]Aetherial Staffbuff[/b] - 50% Spell Absorption. Resist 80% of all shock damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Corruption Staffbuff[/b] - Illusion spells are 100% stronger and Magicka pool is increased by 100 at the cost of 50 reduced health.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Dragonpriest Staffbuff[/b] - Grants 30% Magic resistance and 100% increased Magicka regeneration. Magicka pool increased by 100.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Dwemer Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 50% of all shock damage. Magicka Regenerates 50% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Falmer Staffbuff[/b] - Resist 40% of all Frost Magic. Regenerate Magicka 60% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Forsworn Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction and Restoration spells are 50% stronger.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Hag\'s Wrath Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 50% stronger and costs 50% less Magicka. Resist 50% of all incoming Fire damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Jyrik\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka regenerates 200% faster. Destruction spells are 40% stronger. 50% spell absorption.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Magnus Staffbuff[/b] - All spells are 20% longer and stronger. All spells costs 20% less Magicka. Magic resistance is increased by 40%. Magicka regeneration rate and pool are increased by 100.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Melka\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 60% stronger. Increases Magicka pool by 50.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Miraak\'s Staffbuff[/b] - Destruction spells are 60% stronger. Magicka and Stamina increased by 120. Resist 60% of all [b]incoming Poison[/b] damage.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Sanguine Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka, Health, and Stamina regenerates 200% faster.[/color]
[color=#c0c0c0][b]Wabbajack Staffbuff[/b] - Magicka regenerates 1000% faster. Reduces magicka pool by 200.[/color]
[/center]

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-2-1365283267.png[/img][/center]
[size=3][b]Special Notes:[/b][/size]
\"Beauty is in the eyes of the Skooma-holder\"

[size=3][b]Installing:[/b][/size]
Use desired versions of 1.10x

Copy the \"Data\" folder provided in this archive to your
Skyrim\\Data directory.

Overwrite any other files when prompted.

[size=3][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]
Delete/Remove Staffbuffs.esp/esm & .bsa from your Skyrim\\Data directory.


[center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1365285493.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5099468/][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1365291141.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34444][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-2-1368511241.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35477][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368511239.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35804][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368658336.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36025][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368655631.png[/img][/url]
[/center]
author: jeclxohko
